thread.title: Durham School Services Develops Bus Tracker App
thread.title_full: Durham School Services Develops Bus Tracker App

author: admin
title: Durham School Services Develops Bus Tracker App
text:
Companies mentioned in this article: Durham School Services 
WARRENVILLE, Ill., Sept. 17, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Durham School Services is proud to announce the development and launch of a mobile and browser app (Durham Bus Tracker) that will allow parents and guardians to view the location of their child's bus in relation to their assigned bus stop. 
The app's proprietary design incorporates a number of security features and allows parents and guardians to view only their child's route. The app also offers the ability to view all of your children's assigned routes, on one screen including a scheduled home arrival time. To ensure the safety and privacy of each student the Tracker requires parents and guardians to create a password-protected account along with authenticating their child's school ID in order to access the bus location for their route. 
"We designed Durham Bus Tracker with safety and security in mind, and we are pleased to have built a solution that meets these requirements while also responding to our customer's needs for information," said David A. Duke, CEO of National Express LLC, the parent company of Durham School Services. "The Durham Bus Tracker has been piloted in several of our locations and both parents and school district administrators have found this to be a very valuable and helpful tool." 
The Durham Bus Tracker, which is provided at no additional cost to the school district, parent or guardian, can be downloaded from the Apple App Store, Google Play Store or it can be viewed on a web browser. 
For more information regarding this app please visit www.durhamschoolservices.com/durhambustracker . 
About our company 
Durham School Services, Stock Transportation, Petermann Bus and National Express Transit Corporation, make up National Express, headquartered in Warrenville, Ill. As a leader in transit and student transportation, National Express is committed to exceptional safety, outstanding customer service and positive employee relations. Our North American companies operate more than 21,000 buses and serve 550 clients in 32 states and four provinces. 
To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/durham-school-services-develops-bus-tracker-app-300145258.html 
SOURCE Durham School Services
